Designed for and scaled to 15mm for use with Fallout Wasteland Warfare RPG ruleset.

This pack includes;

 x4 generic plasma rifle armed Enclave in Enclave Power Armor.

x1 Enclave in Hellfire Power Armor with an Incinerator.

x1 Enclave in Telsa armor with a heavy Gatling Laser,
x2 Enclave in Telsa armor with Plasma sniper rifles
x1 Enclave in Telsa armor with a Plasma Sniper Rifle and Plasma Grenade

 Telsa and Enclave Power Armor components taken from Garry Mod - Fallout Server.
 Hellfire pose from Mod loading screen.

item.title: [GRATUIT] Thingiverse > gametree3d > Fallout_RPG___Enclave_Domestication_Deathclaw_Unit [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:5419292

Id objet : 5419292

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • 15mm FALLOUT
  • 15mm FALLOUT HUMAINS

Collections pour tags :

  • 15mm FALLOUT NONDL NONSUP
  • 15mm FALLOUT HUMAINS NONDL NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3
4
5
6
7

Mind control Deathclaw used by the Enclave to defend points around DC.

These are not 100% accurate to the Fallout 3 style Deathclaw model since I've used the Deathclaw models from Fallout 4 instead - but I think they look more menacing this way.

I've also included a modded container and checkpoint barricade for Vertibird drop insertions and/or Enclave site checkpoints .

Scaled to 15mm for use with the Fallout Wasteland Warfare RPG ruleset.

item.title: [GRATUIT] Thingiverse > gametree3d > Fallout_RPG___Brotherhood_of_Steel_QRF___Patrol_Groups [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:5413913

Id objet : 5413913

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • 15mm FALLOUT
  • 15mm FALLOUT HUMAINS

Collections pour tags :

  • 15mm FALLOUT NONDL NONSUP
  • 15mm FALLOUT HUMAINS NONDL NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3
4
5
6

This is a collection of T-60 models found on thingiverse and cult3d put into one dir and scaled to 15mm for use with the Wasteland Warfare RPG ruleset.

 I have added new bases available from Rob Jedi and SebTheis to all models. I did make a completely new model from NikoCans paladin hero; remove all the stowage from his paladin model and modified the weapon on 2 of the non-heavy weapon t-60 models I found so all the base BOS troopers use the same version of the laser rifle.


Credit to AM-Loricen for the POWER ARMOR WITH FATMAN model on cults3d.

item.title: [GRATUIT] Thingiverse > gametree3d > Fallout_RPG___NCR_Patrol_Rangers [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:5402369

Id objet : 5402369

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • 15mm FALLOUT
  • 15mm FALLOUT HUMAINS

Collections pour tags :

  • 15mm FALLOUT NONDL NONSUP
  • 15mm FALLOUT HUMAINS NONDL NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3
4
5
6
7
8
9

Miniatures designed for and scaled to 15mm for use with Fallout Wasteland Warfare RPG.

To access files individually load the .stl file in Microsoft 3D Builder and repair the file (takes about 5minutes) then select ungroup.

Alternatively you can load the .3mf file in Microsoft 3D Builder and select ungroup; this method will allow you to manipulate the models from their pieces and you can swap around heads, weapons and poses to your desire.

The base bodies are from reddawnminiatures
The arms and flag are from ziocru on cults 3d.
The heads, shotgun and carbine are taken from a garrymod addon for fallout rpg.

item.title: [GRATUIT] Thingiverse > gametree3d > Fallout_rpg___Revised_NCR_Combat_Rangers [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:5399271

Id objet : 5399271

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • 15mm FALLOUT HUMAINS
  • 28mm epic GI Bits Builders

Collections pour tags :

  • 15mm FALLOUT HUMAINS NONDL NONSUP
  • 28mm epic GI Bits Builders NONDL NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3
4

A revise of the models made from 3D Desktophero which I took down because they had printing issues and lacked details. These models have been designed for and scaled to 15mm for use with the Fallout Wasteland Warfare RPG rule set. To access files individually, open the file in Microsoft 3D Builder and select ungroup.


The only files missing from this remix of note are the base figure pose models, file named outlaws, which were pulled from Cult3D by Wasteland Trader, who no longer has an account on the site. Additionally, the trail carbine/revolver is from cults3d; Interstellar Army Wasteland Weapons from MKHand_Industries.

Description :

1
2
3
4
5

designed for and scaled for 15mm use with the Fallout Wasteland Warfare rpg ruleset.

*edit* I've upgraded these designs to be individual files, to have bases, and reworked them to be more combat fluid with more generic / heavy weapons. I've also reduced some of overall thickness of the models and repositioned the head after noticing they were rather high on the body when I printed them.

Not included in assets is garrymod enclave armor which has been meshed into the posable designs of miffles-makers awesome t51 kit.
